entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of freezing drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:32 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
